issue.subject: Projection 3857 problem?
issue.description:
I made a new config in my proxy on a wms service.
When I want to execute a GetMap with the SRS 3857, I have the error message : 
Request contains a SRS not offered by the service instance for one or more of the layers.

If I make a getcapabilities on the original service I can see that the 3857 is available.
http://geobretagne.fr/imposm-google?request=GetCapabilities&service=WMS

http://www.crigeos.org/proxy_crigeos/ogc/osm_open?SERVICE=WMS&LAYERS=osm_default&CRS=EPSG:3857&FORMAT=image%2Fpng&TRANSPARENT=FALSE&HEIGHT=977&BGCOLOR=0xFFFFFF&REQUEST=GetMap&BBOX=-152665.39419492602,5357816.753907561,-142183.96669277968,5367252.048391959&WIDTH=1087&STYLES=&VERSION=1.3.0
